explains: n. 镇压，压制；（医）（排泄或分泌物的）流出阻滞；（生）抑制；（遗传）抑制；（心理）压抑；（心理分析）自觉抑制；（电干扰的）消除
wordGroup: fire suppression 灭火；火灾扑救
dust suppression 粉尘消除；除尘措施；粉尘抑制
arc suppression coil 消弧线圈，灭弧线圈

sentences.en: A mother's suppression of her own feelings can cause problems.
sentences.cn: 一位母亲对她自己情感的压抑可能会导致问题。

sentences.en: Eye problems can indicate an unhealthy lifestyle with subsequent suppression of the immune system.
sentences.cn: 眼睛问题表明一种不健康的生活方式以及随后免疫系统所受的抑制。

sentences.en: This genetically determined resting stage, characterized by the cessation of development and protein synthesis and suppression of the metabolic rate, is called diapause.
sentences.cn: 这种由遗传决定的休眠期被称为滞育，其特征是发育和蛋白质合成的停止以及代谢率的抑制。
